text: The Centre for Byzantine Studies or Centre for Byzantine Research () is an organization based in Thessaloniki, Greece. It was founded in 1966 on the initiative of a group of professors from the Faculty of Letters of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. The Centre is a research organization which promotes the study of Byzantine history, culture and civilization.
